actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for cost of living increases in compensation, dependency, and indemnity compensation, and pensions.

summary.text: Provides for cost-of-living increases for veterans' compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation and pension payments equal to the rise in the consumer price index when the Administrator of Veteran's Affairs determines that the Consumer Price Index has increased by 3 percent or more.

titles.title: To amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for cost of living increases in compensation, dependency, and indemnity compensation, and pensions.
